recaps.1: Five years after the Mule's conquest, he continues to rule his empire while obsessively searching for the Second Foundation, using converted agents like Han Pritcher.
recaps.2: The Mule recruits Foundation psychologist Bail Channis to help in the search, believing that an unconverted Foundation citizen might think differently than his converted agents.
recaps.3: Pritcher and Channis travel together to search for clues about the Second Foundation's location, with Pritcher growing increasingly suspicious of his young companion.
recaps.4: The search leads them through various worlds as they investigate potential Second Foundation hiding places, with Channis showing unexpected knowledge and intuition.
recaps.5: They discover that the Second Foundation is located on Trantor, the old Imperial capital, where it has been hiding among the ruins and simple farming communities.
recaps.6: Channis reveals himself to be a Second Foundation agent who has been manipulating the search, leading the Mule into a trap prepared by the mental scientists.
recaps.7: The Second Foundation defeats the Mule using their superior mental sciences, removing his mutant powers and erasing his memory of them, reducing him to a normal human.
recaps.8: With the Mule neutralized, the Second Foundation begins working to restore psychohistory's validity and return the galaxy to Seldon's planned course.
recaps.9: Fifty years later, young Arcadia Darell becomes involved in a new investigation of the Second Foundation, as Foundation citizens fear their mental manipulation.
recaps.10: A group of Foundation researchers, including Arcadia's father Toran, teams up with librarian Homir Munn and statistician Pelleas Anthor to locate and destroy the Second Foundation.
recaps.11: The investigation team travels to various worlds gathering information, while Arcadia has her own adventure that leads her to Trantor and farmer Preem Palver.
recaps.12: Arcadia discovers what appears to be evidence of the Second Foundation on Kalgan and sends this information back to the Foundation investigation team.
recaps.13: The Foundation launches an attack on Kalgan based on Arcadia's intelligence, believing they have found and can destroy the Second Foundation there.
recaps.14: The attack succeeds and the Foundation believes the Second Foundation has been destroyed, with fifty mental scientists apparently captured and eliminated.
recaps.15: Pelleas Anthor reveals himself as a Second Foundation agent and explains that the entire operation was orchestrated to make the Foundation believe the Second Foundation was destroyed.
recaps.16: The real Second Foundation, led by First Speaker Preem Palver, remains hidden and continues to guide galactic history according to Seldon's Plan, now safe from Foundation interference.
